item.title: PSI VisSIG Webinar: Grammar of Graphics - theory to implementation
item.description: In this talk we’ll introduce the Grammar of Graphics, which allows you to compose graphs by combining independent components, and the implementation of this theory in R – the ggplot2 package. We will describe the basics of building plots with ggplot2 and touch on a few approaches for customizing the plots. We will also highlight a few packages that are built to supplement ggplot2.
